column1: countyName,Current Status,Recommended Strategy,Scraping Plan,Website Link (Verified)
Alachua,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Uses a search form (POST request). Use DP to submit empty search or iterate by date.,https://acso.us/inmate-search/
Baker,To Scrape,Requests/BS4,Likely SmartCOP variant. Try direct URL scraping first; if blocked use DP.,http://smartweb.bakercountysheriffsoffice.com/smartwebclient/jail.aspx
Bay,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Mobile-optimized site. Use DP to render the JS list.,https://www.baysomobile.org/is/
Bradford,To Scrape,DrissionPage,SmartCOP system. CLONE YOUR DESOTO SCRIPT.,http://smartweb.bradfordsheriff.org/smartwebclient/Jail.aspx
Brevard,To Scrape,Requests/BS4,Simple HTML 'Bookings' page. Try Requests first for speed.,https://www.brevardsheriff.com/bookings/
Broward,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Complex search with Captcha. Will require DP and potentially a captcha solver.,https://www.sheriff.org/DOD/Pages/ArrestSearch.aspx
Calhoun,To Scrape,pdfplumber,Data is in a PDF. Download with Requests -> Parse with pdfplumber.,https://mws-hrs.com/calhounsheriff/calhounsheriff/JailRosterReport.pdf
Charlotte,SCRAPING,N/A,Already successfully scraping.,https://www.ccso.org/forms/arrestdb.cfm
Citrus,To Scrape,Requests/BS4,Simple 'Recent Arrests' PHP page. Try Requests first.,https://www.sheriffcitrus.org/public_info/recent_arrest.php
Clay,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Police-to-Citizen (P2C) system. Heavy JS. Use DP to click disclaimer.,https://claysheriff.policetocitizen.com/DailyBulletin
Collier,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Requires accepting disclaimer. Use DP to click 'Accept'.,https://www2.colliersheriff.org/arrestsearch/
Columbia,To Scrape,DrissionPage,Likely SmartCOP. Use DP on this direct IP link.,http://50.204.15.10/smartwebclient/jail.aspx
